title: Google Requires Vaccines In Delayed Office Return
text: Google is postponing employees' return to physical offices until October 18, and when people do come back to their desks, COVID-19 vaccinations will be required, Google and Alphabet CEO Sundar Pichai said in a message to employees on Wednesday (July 28). “Getting vaccinated is one of the most important ways to keep ourselves and our […]

title: Alphabet Earnings Powered By Growth In YouTube and Google Cloud
text: Google (Alphabet) earnings report delivered good news on many levels. Google continues to show incredible strength with all three core segments showing growth.

title: Jim Cramer calls out the 'Jimmy Chill contrarians' who bet against Alphabet, AMD, and Boeing
text: CNBC's Jim Cramer took a victory lap on the stocks of Alphabet, AMD, and Boeing after the companies reported better-than-expected quarterly results.

title: Which giant tech stock should you buy in Q3? Apple, Alphabet, or Microsoft?
text: Alphabet Inc. (NASDAQ:GOOG), Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL), and Microsoft Corporation (NASDAQ:MSFT) all reported Q2 results on Tuesday after markets closed. The three technology giants beat analyst expectations on revenue and earnings, sparking an after-hours surge in the stock prices.

title: Google will require COVID-19 vaccine for U.S. employees to step into campuses
text: Alphabet Inc's Google said on Wednesday it would require employees in the United States to be vaccinated for stepping into its campuses, in an effort to get its workers immunized against COVID-19.

title: Google will require vaccination when employees return to offices
text: Google will require vaccination when employees return to offices

title: Google delays return to office, mandates vaccines
text: Google is postponing a return to the office for most workers until mid-October and rolling out a policy that will eventually require everyone to be vaccinated once its sprawling campuses are fully reopened in an attempt to fight the spreading Delta variant.

title: Google postpones return-to-work until October, will require vaccinations
text: Google CEO Sundar Pichai said the company is extending its office return for employees until Oct. 18 amid the latest Covid-19 outbreaks.

title: 4 Alphabet Analysts Break Down Q2 Earnings: 'Google Remains Our Top 2021 FANG'
text: Alphabet, Inc. (NASDAQ:GOOG) (NASDAQ:GOOGL) hit new all-time highs on Wednesday after the company reported second-quarter earnings and revenue beats. Alphabet reported adjusted second-quarter EPS of $27.26 on revenue of $61.88 billion.

title: Alphabet: Ad Revenues Up 69% And EBIT Tripling In Q2 2021
text: Alphabet Q2 results showed dramatic growth and strong operational leverage, with EBIT tripling year-on-year; H1 EPS is 168% higher. All business lines grew between 29% to 84% year-on-year in Q2; Google Advertising revenues grew 69%, and Google Cloud grew 54%.

title: GOOGL Stock: $3,424 Target From Wedbush
text: The shares of Alphabet Inc (NASDAQ: GOOGL) have received a price target increase from $3,127 to $3,424 from Wedbush. These are the details.

title: Alphabet, Apple, Starbucks, Visa and More Wednesday Afternoon Analyst Upgrades and Downgrades
text: With the trading day nearly halfway over, the broad markets were somewhat mixed. The Nasdaq was roaring back up, nearly 1%, while the Dow Jones industrials were slightly negative and the S&P 500 was edging higher.

title: Alphabet (GOOGL) Q2 Earnings Beat Estimates, Revenues Rise Y/Y
text: Alphabet's (GOOGL) second-quarter results benefit from strength across search, advertising, cloud and YouTube businesses.

title: Alphabet Voting Shares Surge After Inclusion in Buybacks
text: Alphabet's $50 billion repurchase program had been limited to the non-voting shares.

title: Searching for Clues in Alphabet's (GOOGL) Earnings Report
text: Google parent Alphabet (GOOGL) trounced earnings expectations, and with Big Money scooping up shares, the stock is set up for more gains.

title: 2 FAANG Stocks Flooded With Bull Notes After Earnings
text: FAANG stocks Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) and Alphabet Inc (NASDAQ:GOOGL) both stepped into the earnings confessional after yesterday's close, becoming the latest Big Tech names  to chime in with quarterly reports.

title: Apple, Google and Microsoft all upgraded after bumper earnings
text: Tech giants Google owner Alphabet Inc, Microsoft Corporation, and Apple Inc all received hefty price upgrades today after all the trio announced bumper earnings last night. UBS raised its target on Alphabet to US$3,190 from US$2,600 compared to a current share price of US$2,638 after what the broker said overall were positive second-quarter numbers.

title: The Ratings Game: Google parent Alphabet's worth to Wall Street soars after blowout results, with UBS lifting share-price target to $3,600 a share
text: The love-in was in session Wednesday on Wall Street after Alphabet's results as big tech rivals Apple and Microsoft also reported quarterly financial results.
